release_note: 1. New Crystal Ball AI Analysis : Wondering how to interact more deeply with your AI friend Worry no more! 2. Starting today your AI friend prepares a range of common functionalities retrieving corresponding memories to thoughtfully respond to every interesting question. Now understanding you through records! Examples include: Respond to recent events Comfort me when I m down Guess my MBTI Compliment my talents Draw a Tarot card for today Ask a question to predict Tarot fortune Analyze relationships with someone Guess gifts I would like You can also customize and ask any questions you care about or want to share with your AI friend anytime. 3. New Relationships feature: Let your AI friend get to know your most important people pets and things. Upload portraits add nicknames and describe their identities. 4. New Identity System : It s now easier to change your nickname! 5. For AI friends a new interface allows you to choose from four options to customize each AI friend s settings making them readily available whenever needed. 6. New Weekly AI Letter Column : Receiving a letter from your AI friend every Sunday at 19:00 is a Lifelight original feature. Liked receiving letters but regretted not being able to view them together Now you can view all historical letters in the dedicated Insights card a way to cherish penpal letters and witness life and growth. 7. New Books recording mode: Search for a book title to automatically add its poster and details. Access books you re interested in with a single click. 8. New Movies recording mode: What good movies have you watched recently and how did you feel Search by movie title and Lifelight automatically records the movie and adds a poster. 9. New Respond to Me button: After pressing your AI partner automatically responds to your thoughts saving the reply in an entry. 10. Shareable graphics now support exporting Comments ! Some functionalities have been renamed for a more accurate experience: Follow Up is now Comments and Paragraph mode is renamed to New Line for easier understanding. 11. Fixed rare issues where clicking on photos and images could cause page freezes. Also fixed compatibility issues with the recording module in some system versions leading to crashes. Improved stability and polished Lifelight in several areas. Enhanced the help email page.

Now understanding you through records! Examples include: Respond to recent events Comfort me when I m down Guess my MBTI Compliment my talents Draw a Tarot card for today Ask a question to predict Tarot fortune Analyze relationships with someone Guess gifts I would like You can also customize and ask any questions you care about or want to share with your AI friend anytime. 3. Improved stability and polished Lifelight in several areas. Enhanced the help email page.

1. New On This Day : Tap the date at the top left corner of the Today page and if memories were left on this month and day in the past a list of years will light up allowing one click navigation from history to today. 2. New UI Multiple Images Display for Entries : Missing photos while reviewing records in Insights Now almost all Insight cards can display multiple images for each entry! Happy moments in Mood Trends now have visual memories. High frequency words recordings and other modules will also display images making memories more vivid. 3. Automatic iCloud Status Display: If iCloud is full you will now be proactively reminded. 4. Improved Album Reminder: If adding pictures is not possible due to album authorization issues an automatic reminder to adjust settings will be provided.

1. Brand New Upgrade Categorized Folders : Major upgrade in the Event Statistics module within Insights! Clearly lists each type of record in the form of folders. Get your Food Diary Travel Diary Pet Diary with one click. 2. New Batch Edit Event Categories : Right in the upgraded Categorized Folders click on an emoji of an entry to edit all categories within that class with one click. Editing categories is more convenient no more worries about missing any! 3. New UI Multiple Images for Entries : Lacking photos when reviewing records in Insights Now almost all Insight cards can display multiple images for entries! Happy moments in Mood Trends now have visual memories. High frequency words recordings and other modules will display images making memories more vivid. 4. New calendar button for more intuitive date switching.

New store page screenshots to quickly familiarize you with Lifelight. Life is not a straight line but a series of moments. Lifelight focuses on recording every moment in life resonating with you in joy and empathizing in sorrow.

1. New Add Music feature: Which song can touch your heartstrings the most There s always that moment when we are moved by certain lyrics and dance to the melody. With Lifelight you can not only search for the songs you want to listen to and create your own playlists but also play them anytime with a click. 2. New Add Podcast feature: Save that insightful podcast by entering its name and it will be automatically searched and added to Lifelight. Listen to it again anytime with just a click. 3. New Auto Read Link feature: The fantastic article you ve recently read the e book you ve gone through the new knowledge you ve acquired just copy the link and Lifelight will automatically paste it to save for you. The original content is just a touch away. 4. New UI for Editing Mode: Easily see what s included in your records fitness information playlists podcasts videos live photos etc. all in the new editing mode at a glance. 5. Improved usability for time editing: Now you can change the time with a simple tap and it also supports editing entries across different days. 6. Trace mode now supports time point recording and has improved the corresponding deletion menu. Fixed an issue where trace content sometimes did not display completely.

The brand new Hand drawn input has arrived: Whether it s with a pencil pen or brushes of various colors you can now capture your inspiration at any time and complement your records with a hand drawn illustration. Delicate dotted grid paper brings back the joyous experience of paper and pen recording. If your drawing includes text Lifelight will automatically generate text notes for you.

1. Introducing the all new Lifelight support for immersive experience available on supported device . Immerse yourself back in memories to those moments: Just by noting down the little things in your life you create a space that listens where AI often shares happiness and sorrow through replies or calls. When you click on a live image or video Lifelight instantly transports you to that space and time. Enter a fully immersive world. Look around listen and observe. Real time weather fills the space allowing you to empathetically experience the starry sky or snow at that moment. What delicious food have you recently eaten How did it feel Lifelight AI is always there to answer any curiosity you have about past memories. 2. Brand New High Frequency Word Mood Calendar: What happened on this day capture each date with a keyword. How did you feel on those dates Now you can view the corresponding mood for each day on the calendar as well. Happy days sad days all clear at a glance. Which day of the week made you the happiest 3. Enhanced Crystal Ball AI: Now it understands you better improving the quality and warmth of responses. Sensing your mood changes it silently accompanies you warming each day. 4. Fixed an issue where the crystal ball couldn t receive calls resolved UI anomalies in the guide pages on some models and addressed the delay in loading videos from iCloud on new devices.

1. New Daily Keyword Calendar : The most beloved journal calendar keywords are here! Automatically extract the most spoken keywords from your records every day and view the events of the month in life at a glance. 2. New Theme Question Library : Where to start recording Morning planning stress relief or evening review choose from the new automatic question library. It also supports AI recommended question libraries frequently used recent question libraries and custom question libraries unique to you. 3. New Follow up mode: Want to add new content to a past memory No problem the new follow up mode is designed for you supplementing past memories and making the progression of memories about a certain event more complete. 4. Fixed an issue where text flickering could occur when the AI actively responds. Significantly improved stability fixed a crash issue in the frequent word module under certain conditions. Improved compatibility with iPad. This update will upgrade the iCloud database temporarily pausing synchronization. Sync will automatically resume after the upgrade is complete.

1. My Lifelight Annual Report 2023 is officially here! Embark on a journey of memories The numbers left behind Favorite type of records Happy mood proportion Number of cities traveled Preferred time for recording Annual vocabulary distribution The most unforgettable days A yearly letter from the crystal ball to you and your exclusive title! 2. New Today s Multi Image Display Now on the record page you can also see multiple images laid out directly Photos Live videos displayed intuitively play with a click.

1. My Lifelight Annual Report 2023 is officially here! Embark on a journey of memories The numbers left behind Favorite type of records Happy mood proportion Number of cities traveled Preferred time for recording Annual vocabulary distribution The most unforgettable days A yearly letter from the crystal ball to you and your exclusive title! 2. New Today s Multi Image Display Now on the record page you can also see multiple images laid out directly Photos Live videos displayed intuitively play with a click.

1. New New Year s Card : Your Lifelight Annual Summary for 2023 will be released on December 30! Before that we invite you to compile the past year s achievements and insights into a New Year s card sharing it with friends and spreading warmth. 2. New Calendar Mode : As 2023 is coming to an end it s time to review the year s calendar! You can view the monthly calendar for any month with recorded entries. Plus view all historical photos and records at once! 3. Lifelight Photo Collection : After opening a photo or video a new feature displays the date and supports a button for fully displaying long text. 4. Fixed an issue where AI Letters could not be opened in some cases improved the stability of incoming letters and made auto saving smarter. 5. Fixed a crash issue that occurred on some models when clicking Finish Adjusting .

1. New New Year s Card : Your Lifelight Annual Summary for 2023 will be released on December 30! Before that we invite you to compile the past year s achievements and insights into a New Year s card sharing it with friends and spreading warmth. 2. New Calendar Mode : As 2023 is coming to an end it s time to review the year s calendar! You can view the monthly calendar for any month with recorded entries. Plus view all historical photos and records at once! 3. Lifelight Photo Collection : After opening a photo or video a new feature displays the date and supports a button for fully displaying long text. 4. Fixed an issue where AI Letters could not be opened in some cases improved the stability of incoming letters and made auto saving smarter. 5. Fixed a crash issue that occurred on some models when clicking Finish Adjusting .

1. Introducing the all new AI Diary Generator : Can t remember what to log down today Lifelight will help you recall it all. Your recent activities photos videos songs exercises and podcasts will be suggested automatically generating your daily entries in a snap. Plus with our AI image recognition feature Lifelight makes describing the content of your pictures easier than ever. 2. The brand new Crystal Ball Call : Experience more heartfelt interactions. When the Crystal Ball responds to your entries it might just reach out to you by voice call enhancing the companionship you feel with the app. 3. New Weekly Crystal Ball Letters : Every Sunday at 7 PM in addition to your regular newsletters you ll receive a warm letter from the Crystal Ball reminiscing about your week with you. 4. The all new Voice Log : Hear the original sound of your life! Lifelight not only maintains every detail of your voice but also converts it into text automatically with AI embedded. 5. Automatically saving Crystal Ball Responses: No need to worry about forgetting to save anymore. The Crystal Ball s responses will be automatically saved once they are entirely displayed. 6. Interactions with the Crystal Ball now included in Exported Pictures: Now when you generate shareable pictures you can choose to include your interactions with AI either the Crystal Ball s questions or its sincere responses merging seamlessly with your entries. 7. Share directly from your Photo Album: You can now share photos directly from your system s photo album to Lifelight adding an extra layer of inspiration to remember your experiences. 8. Quick Easy Today Page Sharing: You can now create a shareable picture of your daily entries with a quick tap on the date at the top left corner of the Today page. Share your day with friends! 9. Optimized Notifications and Widgets: We ve refined notification refresh times for smoother user experience. 10. Expanding Your Input Options: The small circle is now a multimedia button allowing you to add any number of photos live photos or videos even wake up your camera for a quick snap record transcribe audio or switch to paragraph mode for line by line editing.

A brand new app introduction flow makes getting started with Lifelight even easier and more enjoyable. At the same time some UI details have been refined.

1. Exciting Update AI Inspiration Questions : Our Moolight AI Crystal Ball now understands you better! It will generate 3 thoughtful questions based on your recent records to help you delve deeper into your thoughts. Feel free to answer these inspirational questions or refresh to get new ones at any time. 2. New AI Crystal Ball Response UI Display : Now you can easily view the Crystal Ball s heartfelt responses directly in your Today and Gallery sections ensuring it s always there to accompany you. 3. Introducing Moolight Photo Albums Waterfall Flow for categorized viewing! From food diaries and travel logs to pet photo albums sorting and enjoying your memories has never been more convenient and fun. 4. We ve enhanced the quality of the AI Crystal Ball s proactive responses. Now its answers are more diverse and lively than ever. 5. We ve also optimized Moolight Numbers introducing user nicknames display. Moreover we ve improved the first record content for new users all to ensure you have the best user experience. Please note that we will be upgrading our iCloud database from November 2nd to 4th. During this period sync will be temporarily suspended and will automatically resume once the upgrade is completed.

1. Added fresh animations for the proactive crystal ball and a notification for successful saving. 2. We have improved the quality of responses from the proactive crystal ball it understands you better now! 3. Fixed the dynamic wallpaper color display issue on the Mac version.

1. Introducing our brand new Mac version: Constantly by your side Moolight automatically responds to your thoughts and feelings. A complete version of Moolight natively developed for Mac now supports both M series and Intel chips. 2. Improved importing live photos and videos: Now you can import videos from earlier iCloud backups. We have also refined the UI for media selection and improved the Moolight Album adaptation on the iPad. 3. Fixed an issue with the theme color UI display in settings and occasionally unresponsive proactive responses in Portuguese. Added descriptor to new Crystal Ball character cards.

1. New Crystal Ball Identity Setting : Ever wished for a personalized companion within the app Now s your chance to create a unique identity for your crystal ball! Define its name role and personality to make it truly yours. Your crystal ball will now resonate with your thoughts more than ever. 2. New Crystal Ball Memories : Captured a heartfelt response that flashed by Now you can hold onto that moment effortlessly! Whether it s spontaneous responses on the Today page or lengthy replies in the crystal ball cards simply tap the content to save those precious memories. Long press on a record to export it as an image keep it in your gallery or share it directly with your friends. 3. Enhanced Image Sharing: We ve fine tuned the design elements for sharing images. Now no matter the size every image is exported perfectly. Enjoy crisp clear graphics even in long image layouts without a hint of blur. 4. Improved External Record Importing: We ve added a reminder for the date format. If you re importing from an external diary remember to use the yyyy mm dd format in the import template to ensure a smooth transition. This update will also include an iCloud database upgrade. Please note syncing will be temporarily paused from October 5 to 7. Rest assured syncing will automatically resume once the upgrade is completed.
Input box content background protection: The record will be temporarily saved when switching to the background giving you more peace of mind.

1. Refined the animation for the guide UI it now looks much smoother. 2. Improved the keyboard input experience. Even if you exit the app in the background you don t have to worry about losing what you re typing the text will be automatically saved. 3. Fixed an issue where content might not be submitted when using an external keyboard with an iPad.

1. Introducing the brand new Watch version of Moolight! The Moolight on your wrist is Convenient: Let s see who hasn t started using voice recording with a wrist lift yet Considerate: A warm crystal globe at your side automatically responding to you! Complete: Automatic iCloud synchronization historical records and charts Moolight on your wrist is complete in itself! Beautiful: Customize your own theme color delicate and romantic background textures defined by you! 2. Introducing brand new Standby Mode : A new feature in iOS 17 turn your phone sideways and the screen goes dark but Moolight is still sweetly accompanying you! Moolight digits freely display your memories photo gallery... all moving onto your phone. 3. Introducing new interactive widgets: One s mood show is important! On your desktop move your finger and freely switch memories you can t stop at all o . 4. Introducing new customizable mood shows and widgets : Want to review a specific category of recording randomly No problem! In the new version you can customize the type of time and mood favorite state of your random memories. Previous classifications play a big role Tired of looking at one category and lazy to switch manually No worries there is an automatic category rotation option. After turning it on Moolight will automatically switch to the next category after showing each one 20 times. No record will ever be ignored The settings in the mood show will automatically apply to the desktop widgets. That s the joy of the album! 5. Introducing full support for unlimited high definition videos: The videos won t additionally occupy system and iCloud storage space. Automatic storage of cover and album link so you can store long videos with peace of mind! Today Gallery Insight can all play automatically restoring audio and video and easily switch between them. Pause anytime adjust volume. 6. Full support now for adding Live Photos: Audio and moving pictures offer fuller memories 7. Automatic reading of time and location from photos Live motion pictures and videos: Don t worry anymore about adjusting the time for photos from days ago! They will automatically be sorted into the moments on that day. If you re not a fan of recording media info first you can turn off this default option in the settings. 8. Emotion recognition and mood system upgrade: The transition of the traffic lights is more to your liking. The upgraded emotional model has an even higher accuracy! If occasionlally recognition doesn t match your mood you can also modify in the mood trend charts and your mood index will adjust accordingly. 9. Support for recording photos first then adding text: Is the little circle always disappearing Have to record characters before adding pictures Moolight hears your confusion and regret! In the new version the little circle will be in the input box permanently no need to enter text simply touch it to add pictures directly. 10. Brand new Siri voice recording: Siri record on Moolight No need to open the app on lock screens anytime anywhere you can voice record important moments. 11. Directly jump to web links: Not only on the Today page in the Gallery and Insights you can also long press on any web address to jump directly. Store frequently used web address easily thus keeping a handy trick at your disposal 12. Introducing a more comprehensive set of shortcuts: One touch to record switch to crystal ball jump to weekly jump to monthly... This update will carry out iCloud database updates expect to pause synchronization from September 20 to 22. The sync will automatically recover afterwards.

1. Improved the trigger frequency of the active crystal ball making it easier to respond to your voice 2. Modified many UI and copywriting of the guide interface to make it easier for friends to get started 3. Fixed the problem that the active crystal ball may display abnormally on the iPad side.

1. Brand new Gallery Custom Cover : Recorded several pictures in one day and want to set your favorite as the cover for that day No problem! In the gallery details page long press the desired entry image to set it as the cover 2. Brand new Gallery Picture Heatmap : Another display method has been added to the gallery s history! The exciting pictures from the past months are presented as beautiful thumbnails fully satisfying everyone s love to see the monthly images at a glance 3. Fixed the color display of the blank parts in the mood heatmap under dark mode Fixed the occasional inconsistency between the gallery internal and external titles when editing or deleting entries 4. Optimized the unlocking conditions for new users Crystal Ball only 3 entries required. Thanks for the valuable suggestions from everyone!

1. Brand new Proactive Crystal Ball Responses : The crystal ball will send you messages proactively during your recording when it senses specific emotions. It resonates with you when you re happy and shares your sadness when you re down. You can adjust the response frequency of the crystal ball based on your preference or disable it in the settings 2. Gallery heatmap optimization: After scrolling down the gallery page the heatmap mini cards from the recent month will also be collapsed making the heatmap view more neat 3. Fixed the issue where long pressing the record caused abnormal jumping of the crystal ball.

1. New Gallery Mood Heatmap : A new traffic light mood heatmap option has been added to the settings allowing you to more intuitively see the mood distribution of each month. You can easily identify periods of consecutive good days or days of continuous sadness at a glance 2. Fixed an issue in the heatmap where sorting might not have followed date rules. Now the dates are arranged horizontally and the corresponding days and record distributions match perfectly.

1. Brand new store page screenshots optimized for all regions individually. 2. Fixed some translation problems fixed the problem that the first attention keywords may not take effect optimized the display of high frequency words in the English version and improved the UI text in English and other language versions.

1. Upgraded Single Share Image style: Fixed the potential issue of black boxes appearing when sharing directly Added a pure white background image adapted to the custom background texture setting Optimized the display of the custom geographical location 2. Optimized the export style of Moolight Print Shop .

1. Brand new Share This Day image: On the Gallery page click on the top right corner of any day to directly export the text and image records of that entire day. You can still customize the timeline location etc. display 2. Upgraded Single Share Image style: Add a rounded corner frame with the Moonlight characteristic the shared image is more refined 3. Gallery timeline display optimization: Want to look back at historical records and also glimpse at that time No problem the new version of the time display is clearer.

1. New map modification mode: now you can not only select points on the map to modify but also search for modifications directly 2. A series of system adaptations have been modified so you will find that the stability of Heartlight is better when using the beta version of the system 3. In response to your feedback copy mode is now back. New activity: We are looking forward to listening to your voice we are organizing the first phase of Listening to your voice and developers 1 to 1 online activity you can sign up by joining Discord. https: discord.gg uNUUWAsmeH

1. Single Export Share Image Optimization: The new UI brings a more exquisite and refreshing single export image. With one click you can share the beautiful graphic records with friends or keep them as fine cards for yourself. 2. Export Share Image Adaptation: Users who have upgraded to the latest system version can also use the single export image and print shop normally! 3. Weekly and Monthly Reminder Optimization: If there are no records for the current week or month no reminders will be triggered.
Fixed an issue that could cause the crystal ball to fail to load and improved its stability.

1. Daily Weekly Monthly automatic push: Through notifications a daily overview weekly and automatic monthly issues will be regularly pushed to your hand. Don t miss the exciting summaries! If you are not accustomed to being disturbed you can also customize the switch for each type of reminder in the settings menu. 2. The display of the Event Tracker card has been optimized.

Fixed a rare issue causing crashes during voice input. Focused on multi language optimization the overall UI and UX have greatly improved the adaptation for English French German Portuguese Italian and Spanish.

Improved the UI at the end of the trial period and completed preparations for the launch of the new annual fee slot. There are now more options for either favoring subscriptions or buyouts. Fixed a rare issue that could cause accidental line breaks due to keyboard issues.

1. Added Full Image mode to the gallery: Now the gallery tends to display full images allowing you to enjoy beautiful photos without needing to open them. Of course if you prefer the previous compact and orderly layout you can switch to image cropping display in More Details 2. Fixed an issue in some iOS versions where the app crashes after clicking I want to own .

1. Upgrade to Map Journey location system: The issue of slow refresh rates of new locations has been resolved and the new scheme is also more power efficient. 2. Upgrade to Mood Trends : In addition to happy sad events other emotionally neutral events occurring each day can now also be displayed. UI and copy experience has also been optimized. 3. Significant performance optimization: Bottom bar switching speed has increased eliminating 0.5 second lag. Issues with personalized theme color failure and keyboard shadowing in iOS 17 have also been fixed. 4. Optimized the text in Word Cloud when happy words are still on their way. 5. Continued optimization of the presentation of the Random Show widget.

1. Major update: brand new Word Cloud : Automatically record word frequency analysis in full! Roaming in your own word frequency ocean the review record is full of surprises. 2. Big update: New Word Happiness Component Analysis : When each word is mentioned how likely is it to be a happy record Moolight has analyzed it for you! Come here to analyze your happy sad password and understand yourself more. 3. Upgrade Photo Album : The photo waterfall view has supported for viewing in reverse order. 4. Added some codes for iOS17.

1. New desktop and lock screen widgets : seven days of mood swings the most recent events the words imprinted in your mind pictures in time etc. We ve been listening to you and now we finally have the opportunity to communicate with you directly on your desktop. The powerful desktop widget system with a wide variety of categories together with the matching lock screen widget will keep you company. 2. New gallery Picture of the Day : If you have a picture in your record of the day the gallery will automatically display it for you in the form of a card. A picture of the day or a text summary of the day s memories will be displayed clearly. 3. New photo album picture waterfall mode: In the waterfall mode of the photo album you can see all the photos at once. All the wonderful pictures can be easily swiped at your fingertips. This update will upgrade the iCloud database and the syncing will be suspended during the upgrade period and will resume automatically on June 6 after the App is upgraded to the latest version. This update will also upgrade the photo system so if you have a lot of pictures recorded before please wait a short time for the automatic upgrade when you start for the first time after the update.
This version adjusts the display of moods reverting to a display that uses red yellow and green to indicate mood status keeping it simple while listening to your heart.

1. Major update Global Crystal Ball: With a remaining crystal ball long press on an entry anywhere in Moolight to evoke a response from the crystal ball. Whether you just finished recording in Today or check your recent record in Gallery or stumble upon a long ago memory in Insight ...... As long as you want to be heard the crystal ball is always with you anytime anywhere to give you a response. 2. Today page optimization: When you go back to the past to make up notes the Back to Today button will be hidden automatically after the keyboard is called out in order to avoid mistaken touches. 3. Gallery detail page optimization: When long pressing the content of the entry a new Modify button is added which can go back to that day directly after clicking and automatically place the original record in the pop up input box for quick modification a new page flip animation is added when switching the date before and after. 4. Moolight Monthly: New left and right swipe or click the left and right edge buttons to switch between before and after Monthly support drag down to refresh monthly content new page flip animation. 5. Crystal Ball Perfection: Added the Turbo Mode indicator and continued to optimize the Pro Mode performance. 6. iCloud synchronization for Tracked Words: Fixed the problem of multi device synchronization. 7. Touch ID verification on Mac: Fixed the problem of too frequent verification that may occur. 8. Bug Fix: Fixed a possible crash issue in the Gallery page for iPhone 11 series devices.
Fixed an issue where the text input area was too small due to an abnormal voice input UI.

1. New Live Wallpaper color card: Live wallpaper now supports custom color cards upload any picture and it will be automatically converted into a color card for you. The lavender sky the afterglow of the sunset and the tree lined road you walked what kind of photos would you choose to make a color card 2. Improve the Crystal Ball Emojis support: while adding expressions improve the multilingual mixed output. You can record in various languages even if you want to learn different languages with the crystal ball 3. Improve Single Export : Now it is perfectly linked with the print shop. The font weight and font style in the print shop can be automatically applied to a single export. In addition the single sharing of the crystal ball also adds a time display button.

According to the recent feedback iterations to improve the performance of the crystal ball. Such as asking for comfort tarot cards etc. The probability of suggestions appearing has been reduced and the overall response style is more natural and friendly. Fixed the flickering situation in dark mode when sharing a single entry.

1. New Map Journey filter: Want to know where you have experienced novel food no problem! Open the new filter function you can get the food map. Each category can be freely filtered 2. Added a custom switch for Single Share : it supports displaying or hiding geographic location and time information and you can also choose a white or beige background 3. Fixed the problem that when sharing a single item there may be a problem that the shared content is inconsistent with the selected item. Fixed a rare crash that occurred when using the keyword tracking function on the Mac side.

1. New map journey location modification mode: fill in the content but struggling with geographic location can not be recorded Don t worry. In this new mode you can update your location by poking a dot on the map at will 2. New Crystal Ball internationalization: Both the standard version of Crystal Ball with fast response and the professional version with deep insight are now fully available to global users. Also new compatibility mode automatic retry when network encounters problems 3. restructure many text boxes improve the UI at the same time input experience more smooth. Fix the situation that the text of Crystal Ball answers may overlap in a small probability.

1. Print Shop upgrade: the categories now support personalized Emoji while the long picture mode also complete various picture size adaptations 2. Crystal Ball upgrade: now the answer is more friendly and the ability of the role function has been improved. You can define settings such as professional counselor and understanding best friend which will be more effective when used together with the new Crystal Ball professional mode 3. improved the UI display of partners with different length recording habits in Monthly fixed the problem that the iPad insight page might not be displayed in vertical screen mode improved the support for large fonts on the insight page on Mac and improved the consistency of the dynamic wallpaper when using personalized colors.

1. Brand new Custom Font Size : You can follow the system settings or personalize them supports Mac iPad iPhone settings. 2. Crystal Ball ability upgrade: Fragments accumulate faster! Adopting natural language fluid responses for a friendly chat experience. There is also a new loading time progress bar so you know how long it will take for complex questions 3. Print Shop font style improvement: Now you can freely choose the font weight for export content 4. A series of small fixes: Fixed the issue of the gallery crashing on iPhone XS models when clicking on an image fixed the problem of UI obstruction when using the extra large font in accessibility improved the transparency of keyword tracking cards on Mac fixed the saving of geographic location in editing mode fixed UI issues when selecting personalized colors on some devices added a high frequency word reset button.

1. Brand new Moolight Print Shop card: The magical print shop located in Moolight allows you to customize printing lists and batch export beautiful PDFs or long images. For example by event category you can export all my food records or my travel records at once... By mood type you can export all my happy records and my sad records at once etc. You can also customize the start and end times many display details cover text and signature information. 2. Dynamic wallpaper optimization: Upgraded Lively wallpaper deeply unifying the wallpaper effects of the Today Gallery Insight three pages beautiful and dazzling bringing you a brand new immersive recording experience with the change of daylight. 3. Gallery reminder for turning the month: Happy May! Where did the historical records go after flipping the month Just pull down! 4. Fixed known issues: 1 Custom title for the Gallery : Fixed display issues that may be caused by switching back 2 Crystal Ball : Fixed the issue where content might not refresh 3 My High Frequency Words : Fixed possible issues with high frequency words not updating and app crashing.

1. Introducing the new Moolight Crystal Ball self questioning feature: for example Please help me analyze my psychological state I m so anxious Please help me analyze my MBTI personality Guess what type of movies I like to watch and so on. Moolight will sort through your records to help you gain insight into yourself. The first time you use this feature Moolight AI will need to update itself taking anywhere from a few seconds to several minutes. During the self update iCloud syncing will be temporarily paused and will automatically resume later 2. Introducing the new Personalized AI fully automatic mode: when fully automatic mode is enabled Moolight will automatically adjust the record categories based on your recording style. Each adjustment and guidance you make will automatically direct your unique personalized AI to learn creating a one of a kind AI that understands only you 3. Introducing the new Personalized Categories editing mode: you can now modify both Emojis and category names. The modified categories will be automatically applied to all past records and will update your personalized AI 4. Added some star related Emojis and fixed the display issue of the lock screen widget.

This update includes iCloud maintenance and upgrades during which syncing will be paused. After upgrading Moolight to the latest version syncing will automatically resume on April 8th. 1. Added Lock Screen Widget : Click to directly access the recording screen in one step 2. Added support for iPad split screen display making the gallery page perfectly adaptable to different display sizes 3. Added emotion adjustment for entries in Mood Trends : Now you can long press an entry to adjust its mood category 4. Improved automatic recording for the Mood Traffic Light on the Today page: Your manually selected mood will now be retained and given higher priority over AI detected moods 5. Improved Today s Headlines on the gallery page: Headlines you ve previously selected will have higher priority than AI generated categories. If you manually add a headline it will have the highest priority 6. Improved Moolight Monthly filtering: Words you ve set to be filtered out in Insights will now also be filtered out in Moolight Monthly 7. Added landscape series Emojis to Personalized AI 8. Improved the AI auto detection accuracy of Today s Headlines in multiple languages 9. Moolight will now automatically switch back to today s record when entering the background 10. Fixed crashes in Moolight Gallery due to insufficient memory on some devices 11. Fixed the issue of not being able to edit headlines in Moolight Gallery with certain image ratios 12. Fixed the issue of not being able to import when the number of characters is less than two 13. Improved the UI for custom links.

1. Introducing the all new Universal Drag Drop automatic input recognition: On iPad Mac and other devices simply drag and drop images text or cutouts into the input box and Moolight will automatically recognize the type and add it. Super convenient in split screen mode! 2. Significant improvement of Moolight Crystal Ball AI : Now the Crystal Ball provides more comprehensive feedback with a more complete analysis. Whether seeking comfort or advice it s better in every way 3. Full photo adding capabilities on Mac: Supports your iCloud albums system albums drag and drop illustrations or opening the camera 4. New Touch ID support across the board: Moolight fully protects your privacy whether it s Face ID or Touch ID on Mac iPad Air iPhone SE and other devices 5. New Auto Scroll Input : After upgrading the operating system to the latest version such as iOS 16.4 iPhone iPad and Mac fully support auto scroll input scrolling as you write 6. New Auto Popup Keyboard for Editing : Automatically saves information from previous records when modifying an entry making your edits seamless with the popup keyboard 7. New Shake to Recover Recently Deleted toggle: Completely customizable based on your usage scenarios and preferences 8. Line break mode extended to all devices: Now Mac and iPad also fully support the line break mode in addition to iPhone 9. Fixed an issue where the keyboard input sound was too loud.

1.Brand new notification system: Let Moolight decide the perfect time for writing reminders. Moolight AI will analyze your recording habits offline and automatically adjust the reminder time. Receive fun and varied greetings to remind you to capture life s wonderful moments 2.Added iPad multilingual input method support: Now users with keyboards from around the world can enjoy using the app in external keyboard mode on the iPad 3.New Tools Emojis : As requested by our shining users we have added new tool themed emojis to the icon library for your selection.

Major Update: Introducing the brand new Insight Card of the Crystal Ball! With a caring and powerful AI it listens gently to your recorded thoughts and this is where magic happens. You can customize its name and identity whether it s your best friend or your pet dog! Through the Crystal Ball you can share your recent records look back at the happy moments of the week review your food diary of the month confide in it about your difficult experiences and seek comfort or even seek encouragement and advice... with this exclusive AI it listens to your heart.

1. New Monthly Magazine : Swipe left in the gallery page to see the monthly summary presented in the form of a magazine with personalized AI for you. Whether it s the mood index or the monthly headlines you can review your life like a magazine. 2. New Heat Map : Pull down the gallery page to see the heat map you ve been waiting for. Click on the heat map you can see the details of the current month s records. 3. New Camera mode: There is a new way to record photo stories. Gently slide the small circle at the top right of the input box you can directly enter the camera mode. Telephoto lens wide angle lens front selfie all support. 4. Crystal ball details optimization: thoughtful and powerful AI gentle listening to your recorded heart here is where the magic is born.

1. Added preparation works for a brand new feature called Moolight Crystal Ball which will allows you to get more personalized feedback 2. Refined iOS 15 compatibility support and polished the in app localization.

1. New iOS 15 compatibility support: 70 files 200 changes the iOS 15 you ve been waiting for is now officially compatible. If you want Weather and Mood Trends updating your device to iOS 16 will automatically enable them. 2. New Tracking Keyword customization: If you want to group both Photography Photo in one card based on the aggregated keywords just use the symbol to connect them. For example photography photo you can combine the two into one card. 3. Improve the new Face ID password unlock: If Face ID fails to unlock more than three times due to any circumstances the password unlock screen will be triggered automatically. No longer have to worry about waiting for Face ID cooling time because of accidental unlock failure.

New Automatic Association Aggregation Tracking : In Insights Tracking Keywords click the star button in the upper left corner to open the new AI capability. For example if the vocabulary you are tracking is proverbs in the aggregation tracking mode you can automatically associate famous sayings mottoes proverbs philosophies fables and so on and pay attention to them automatically.

1. New background privacy protection mode: In the privacy and security settings a new background privacy protection mode has been added. When the app enters the background this mode will automatically blur all private information while ensuring absolute data security it also gives you maximum peace of mind 2. Added a story on the insight page of the album: recently recorded pictures you can now see the corresponding text records on the insight page 3. Optimize the details of tracking words : Adjust the UI display method of tracking words so that they do not flash when the week is switched 4. Optimize the logic of Face ID : Fixed the problem that the higher frequency option in the privacy and security settings did not take effect in some cases.

1. the new photo album : with the recorded text view the photo story. 2. new picture storage : click on the circle at the top right of the input field you can store high definition pictures and the pictures are connected to the personalized AI of the text of the entry. 3. new picture full screen mode: click on the picture in any interface to enter full screen mode two fingers open and close the zoom vertical direction slide out of the full screen. 4. new input mode option : in Settings Font Style add continuous input mode. 5 5. new modify status mark: when the entry is modified the previous record time location and other information will be automatically retained. 6. fix the text protection mechanism: solved the situation that the previous protection mechanism was mistakenly triggered and swallowed words in a few cases. 7. improve the jumping logic back to today: when switching the date it will not jump back to today within 15 seconds even if it switches to the background. 8. improve the keyboard closing mechanism: in today s page the keyboard will be closed automatically when you slide down.

1. the new photo album : with the recorded text view the photo story. 2. new picture storage : click on the circle at the top right of the input field you can store high definition pictures and the pictures are connected to the personalized AI of the text of the entry. 3. new picture full screen mode: click on the picture in any interface to enter full screen mode two fingers open and close the zoom vertical direction slide out of the full screen. 4. new input mode option : in Settings Font Style add continuous input mode. 5 5. new modify status mark: when the entry is modified the previous record time location and other information will be automatically retained. 6. fix the text protection mechanism: solved the situation that the previous protection mechanism was mistakenly triggered and swallowed words in a few cases. 7. improve the jumping logic back to today: when switching the date it will not jump back to today within 15 seconds even if it switches to the background. 8. improve the keyboard closing mechanism: in today s page the keyboard will be closed automatically when you slide down.

Note: This version will perform a pre upgrade of the image storage database. During the upgrade period iCloud synchronization will be affected and suspended during February 16 18. Please upgrade the apps on each platform to the latest version and iCloud will be automatically restored after the database upgrade period is over. Added the following functions: 1. Add personalized exclusive high frequency words: My high frequency words card now supports adding personalized exclusive words! What you care most about will be presented together 2. Display of the number of tracking keywords: a brand new statistical UI for items the number of items is clear at a glance 3. Improved input experience: Eliminate the last bit of stuttering upgrade the input experience and make typing absolutely smooth 4. Database upgrade: prepare for database upgrade for the upcoming image storage.

My high frequency words: now you can view them in 7 day increments. You can go back and forth to find out how things have changed for you at different stages of your life. You can also adjust the global mode to see what you care most about in all your records.

1. Daily headlines in the gallery: the accuracy of the headlines has been improved 2. Insight record sorting: Fixed possible time sorting issues 3. Personalized AI experience improvement: Improve the instructions for use and optimize the training experience when using it for the first time.

Train your own AI: Now you can train your own personalized AI unique to you on your device. You are the sole owner of your data and the learning process is entirely on the device itself. The new hybrid model mode allows you to have the advantages of both the default model and the personalized model.
UI Refinement: Fixed the UI problem for the iPhone mini series Custom Colors: Fine tuned UI details for custom colors.

New timeline view: precise view of each record time with more entry styles available. Editing experience optimization: now the earliest recorded time location and weather information will be retained when editing Event classification: continue to optimize the accuracy of Chinese event classification. Input experience optimization: now it is more convenient to record long contents. Problem fix: Fixed the problem that the date record cannot be earlier than 2020.
